channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Coventry Close NW6 6FH, 18th December
item.description:
Overflowing bags of household rubbish have been pilling up all week. They are spilling out onto the pavement and getting torn apart by vermin.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Coventry Close, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Chestnut Road SE27 outside house number 2 green, 18th December

item.title: Chestnut Road SE27 re the side of 539 – 541 Norwood, 18th December
item.description:
Chestnut Road SE27 re the side of 539 – 541 Norwood Road (Co-op shop) – towards the rear of the side of this shop (next to the loading bay) grey door graffiti tagged. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for report map pin, picture and Google Streetview: https://www.google.com/maps/@51.4343009,-0.1031302,3a,75y,337.63h,81.94t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1s-UzOoOwehKuSxs4IrKpC7w!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D8.058122919692636%26panoid%3D-UzOoOwehKuSxs4IrKpC7w%26yaw%3D337.62978882270517!7i16384!8i8192?entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MTIwOS4wIKXMDSoKLDEwMDc5MjA2N0gBUAM%3D

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 539-541, Norwood Road, West Norwood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
